issuer_key.description: list of issuer keys, listed in descending date order (most recent first)

date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date time the key was issued.

key.description: Bitcoin address (compressed public key, usually 24 characters) that the issuer uses to issue the certificates.

invalidated.description: Optional ISO-8601 formatted date time the key was invalidated.

revocation_key.description: list of issuer keys, listed in descending date order (most recent first)

date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date time the key was issued.

key.description: Bitcoin address (compressed public key, usually 24 characters) that the issuer uses to revoke the certificates.

invalidated.description: Optional ISO-8601 formatted date time the key was invalidated.
